abstract: Some customers like the company’s responses to online criticism; others see an eerie version of “Big Brother.”
snippet: Some customers like the company’s responses to online criticism; others see an eerie version of “Big Brother.”
lead_paragraph: PHILADELPHIA  Brandon Dilbeck, 20, a student at the University of Washington, was complaining recently on his blog, Brandon Notices, about Comcast’s practice of posting ads in its on-screen programming guide.

headline.main: Griping Online? Comcast Hears and Talks Back
headline.print_headline: Griping Online? Cable Company Hears You and Talks Right Back
